data.name: Poopoo Monster
data.detailed_description:
Check out my other game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2067570/Egghead_Gumpty/


About the Game



WARINING: YOU HAVE TO BE MINIMUM 18,000 YEARS OLD TO PLAY THIS GAME
Poopoo Monster is a terrifying surreal horror game where you fight a giant ass monster.

Story:

You're casually travelling through the desert when suddenly your truck breaks down close to a mysterious village. The village residents seem like nice people but something is off about the whole place. You learn that the village is being haunted by a giant ass monster, and you're the only person who can stop it. You're the only person who can stop the Poopoo Monster.

Gameplay & Features:

Explore the village while meeting the lovely friendly village residents. Throughout your time spent in the village, the Poopoo Monster attacks and terrorizes the area. Smell the danger. Hide for your life. Fight the terrifying urban legend.
- Explore the village
- Meet the residents
- Hide & fight the monster
- Collectibles
- Poopoo
- Farmer Gregory

data.short_description: Your truck breaks down in a small village in the middle of the desert smeared by a horrifying creature. Smell the danger. Hide for your life. Fight the terrifying urban legend, the Poopoo Monster.
